Package it.polimi.ingsw.Client

Interface Ui

All Known Implementing Classes:
CLI, GUI
public interface Ui

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String nextLine​(java.util.Scanner in)
    This method unifies the nextLine function for every Ui, so that the Client can call it without having to do boring instanceofs
    void process​(Message input)
    Processes input Message.
    void process​(java.lang.String input)
    Processes input String message.
    void processTurnChange​(ClientState newState)
    Responsible for reacting to new ClientState
    void showTable​(CellView[][] table)
    Responsible for printing game table.
    void waitForIP​(Client client)
    Starts Client thread, asking for IP input if necessary.

  • Method Details

    • process

      void process​(java.lang.String input)
      Processes input String message. Message can be either a simple String or a "message" String. Message strings are formatted as follows: [ TYPE ] + n * ( SEPARATOR + ARG ) with n = #arguments SEPARATOR = @@@ TYPE = - CHOICE : server prompts client for choice; used when asking for gods, positions
      Parameters:
      input - message to be processed

    • process

      void process​(Message input)
      Processes input Message.
      Parameters:
      input - message to be processed

    • waitForIP

      void waitForIP​(Client client)
      Starts Client thread, asking for IP input if necessary.
      Parameters:
      client - Client to be ran

    • showTable

      void showTable​(CellView[][] table)
      Responsible for printing game table.
      Parameters:
      table - to be printed

    • processTurnChange

      void processTurnChange​(ClientState newState)
      Responsible for reacting to new ClientState
      Parameters:
      newState - state to be processed

    • nextLine

      java.lang.String nextLine​(java.util.Scanner in)
      This method unifies the nextLine function for every Ui, so that the Client can call it without having to do boring instanceofs
      Parameters:
      in - input Scanner
      Returns:
      string to be parsed and eventually written to output
